titleStmt.title: Whereas we have received information, that Connor ô Dee, late of Arglin, in the county of Tipperary, yeoman, and Richard Power, late of Ballintotry in the said county yeoman, have of late committed several burglaries, robberies, and stealths ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Arran.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.

titleStmt.title: Whereas we have received information, that Connor ô Dee, late of Arglin, in the county of Tipperary, yeoman, and Richard Power, late of Ballintotry in the said county yeoman, have of late committed several burglaries, robberies, and stealths ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Arran.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.
Arran, Richard Butler, Earl of, d. 1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took and John Crook ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the 12th. day of October 1683."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
